cleaned_text: Acupuncture With a well documented history spanning more than 2,000 years, acupuncture is still one of the most commonly used medical procedures in the world today. To treat a patient, the acupuncturist uses hair-thin needle to stimulate special points on the body, which are carefully chosen based on the appropriate Traditional Oriental Medicine diagnosis. When the needle activates the energy in the meridians, the patient may feel tingling, heaviness, or warmth around the point being needled. When energy flows free through the meridians, the body obtains all the essential nutrients and energy for itself. And when it reaches to the optimal energy stage level, your body is pain and disease free. Conditions we can help: - Headache - Neck pain - Low back pain - Disc Injury - Sciatica - Digestive Disorder - Anxiety - Sleep problem - Joint pain - Arthritis - Sprain/Strain - Skin problems - Allergy - Sinusitis - Common cold - and more Contact Tustin Chiropractic & Acupuncture Clinic to schedule time for acupuncture at your next visit.
